Class PlansResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.http.types.PrettyJsonResource
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.http.endpoints.PlansResource

  • public class PlansResource
extends PrettyJsonResource
    API for management of Plan(s).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlansResource(java.util.Collection<PlanManager> planManagers)
      Creates a new instance which allows access to the provided plans.
      PlansResource(PlanCoordinator planCoordinator)
      Creates a new instance which allows access to plans in the provided coordinator.
